extension.name: Continuous rss scrolling
extension.author: Gopi.R
extension.description: Continuous rss scrolling. scroll your rss feed using this simple plugin.

field.name: crs_record_height
field.label: Height
field.description: Each scroller height in scroll. ( e.g 40 )

field.name: crs_display_count
field.label: Display count
field.description: Display number of record at the same time in scroll. ( e.g 5 )

field.name: crs_display_width
field.label: Title length
field.description: Enter max character for each feed title. ( e.g 200 )

field.name: crs_rss_url
field.label: Feed url
field.description: Enter the feed url. ( e.g http://www.gopiplus.com/extensions/feed )

field.name: crs_cache
field.label: Cache
field.description: Remember last viewed slide and recall within same session?
